com.pax.us.pay.ui.constant.entry.enumeration

Class PartialApprovalOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pax.us.pay.ui.constant.entry.enumeration.PartialApprovalOption

  • public final class PartialApprovalOption
extends java.lang.Object
    Options when handle a partial-approved transaction

    For ConfirmationEntry.ACTION_REVERSE_PARTIAL_APPROVAL, the options are REVERSE and ACCEPT
    If select REVERSE, the transaction will be voided.
    If select ACCEPT, the transaction will be accepted with partial-approval.

    For ConfirmationEntry.ACTION_SUPPLEMENT_PARTIAL_APPROVAL, the options are ACCEPT and DECLINE
    If select ACCEPT, a split-tender transaction will be started.
    If select DECLINE, this transaction will be accepted with partial-approval.
